data.meanings: to plaster with clay or mud, clay/mud.
data.sentence: The word طِينٍ comes from the root ط ي ن and is associated with the meanings: to plaster with clay or mud, clay/mud.

data.meanings: To deprive from, harden, hide, resist, forbid, prevent, hinder, prohibit access (to a place).
data.sentence: The word حِجَارَةً comes from the root ح ج ر and is associated with the meanings: To deprive from, harden, hide, resist, forbid, prevent, hinder, prohibit access (to a place).

data.meanings: to send a messenger, bestow, let go. rasul (pl. rusul) - envoy, bearer of a message, messenger. risalat - message, commission, mission, epistle. arsala (vb. 4) - to send. mursalat (pl. of mursalatun) - those sent forth.
data.sentence: The word لِنُرْسِلَ comes from the root ر س ل and is associated with the meanings: to send a messenger, bestow, let go. rasul (pl. rusul) - envoy, bearer of a message, messenger. risalat - message, commission, mission, epistle. arsala (vb. 4) - to send. mursalat (pl. of mursalatun) - those sent forth.
